October is falling like a radiation-laden meteor, and we've got a beastly lineup hitting the shelves on October 3rd and 10th that'll make your speakers weep IN DELIGHT! ðŸŽ¶ðŸ”¥

And then thereâ€™s the legendary **INCUBUS**, whoâ€™ll be tearing through your playlists like a savage beast unleashed upon a digital realm â€” it's as heavy as your crypto wallet when the bulls come charging!
So, strap in, hold tight, and keep those eyes peeledâ€”because these ten records are your ticket to the sonic battlefield this month! Don't miss the carnage; it's about to get gloriously messy. ðŸ¤˜ðŸŽ¤ðŸ’°
This is the kind of chaos you donâ€™t want to ignore! These releases have been coded straight from the fires of Hell, just for you! ðŸ”¥ðŸ¤˜
Stay savage, my metalheads! Until next time, keep your wallets fat and your playlists even fatter! Metal, crypto, and chaos FOREVER! \m/ \m/
